

# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# build logs.
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# VS Code specific files
.vscode/

# Rider specific files
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# Database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Package directories
*.nuget/
node_modules/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local

# Publish output
publish/
wwwroot/

# Certificates
*.pfx
*.p12

# Dependency cache
*.deps.json

# Lock files
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json

# Azure and hosting artifacts
.localhistory/
*.publishsettings
